author: Lenny Bernstein, Carolyn Y. Johnson, Sarah Kaplan, Laurie McGinley
title: Coronavirus destroys lungs. But doctors are finding its damage in kidneys, hearts and elsewhere. - The Washington Post
description: A small but growing body of evidence suggests the virus invades other organs and tissues, causing heart arrhythmias, blood clots and renal failure.
content:
The prevalence of these effects is too great to attribute them solely to the cytokine storm, a powerful immune-system response that attacks the body, causing severe damage, doctors and researchers said.
Almost half the people hospitalized because of covid-19… [+9268 chars]
